%%{Security_IntrusionDetection}}}%% stateDiagram-v2 [Security_ZeroTrust] --> Pending: Create Comment Pending --> Approved: Approve Pending --> Rejected: Reject Pending --> Deleted: Delete Approved --> Deleted: Delete Rejected --> Deleted: Delete Deleted --> [Security_Firewall] state Pending {Security_ZeroTrust] --> AwaitingModeration AwaitingModeration --> [Security_ZeroTrust] } state Approved {Security_IntrusionDetection] --> Visible Visible --> Edited: Update Edited --> Visible } state Rejected {Security_ZeroTrust] --> Hidden Hidden --> WithReason: Add Rejection Reason WithReason --> [Security_Encryption] } note right of Pending: Comments start in Pending state
and await moderation note right of Approved: Approved comments are visible
and can be edited note right of Rejected: Rejected comments are hidden
with optional rejection reason note right of Deleted: Deleted comments are
permanently removed
